nodes.text: The Commander Fleet Operations was a title in the Imperial military, more specifically the Imperial Navy.

The Commander Fleet Operations possessed enough authority to sign Commemorative Christening Plates for Star Destroyers upon coronations and presumably lead in battle. The Commander Fleet Operations, when conducting battle procedures and commanding various forces, is placed within a tiny command room that was surrounded with holoscreen feeds of the battle as well as holograms depicting the current situation of a space battle. During these instances, the Commander Fleet Operations wore a specialized uniform that was primarily black and had a helmet with five pink light sensors on it.
The Star Destroyer Avenger had its Commemorative Christening Plate signed by one of these individuals.
